channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ILsyXRX.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://elyrion718.web44.net/index.php?"][SIZE=3]- Website Home - [/SIZE][/URL][URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/ot4rmz7oaj8p0nt/Elyrion.jar?dl=0"][SIZE=3]Download Client - [/SIZE][/URL] [URL=http://"http://elyrion718.web44.net/index.php?/index"][SIZE=3]Forums -[/SIZE][/URL]
- About Elyrion - Elyrion is a 718/742 and this is an economy server. What can Elyrion bring me more than other servers? Your answer is here: We have a unique home, all npcs spawned working, a custom Grand Exchange, unique features and etc, so why not join now? (Challenge, beat 9 players online)
[SPOILER=Features]- Lodestones - Bank Pins - Player Customisation - 23 Working Skills - All npcs spawned working (Dialogue, combat etc) - 5 Minigames - 8 Bosses - Resource dungeons - Custom economy - Custom Grand Exchange - Skills fully working with toolbelt - Report players - Working toolbelt - Dwarf Cannon - Etc.. [/SPOILER]

item.title: Elyrion - G.E | PK | PvM | Daily Updates | Friendly Community |
item.dc:creator: @Elyrion718 Elyrion718
item.description:
@Elyrion718 wrote:

kaxman:

just logged on to see whats up, only one on, hope the 50x starts working for ya, missed the old server… please bring it back as it was at start and I know of 3 steady players who would be there now…

What was your name in-game ?

15/8/2015 Updates:
1- Currently changing home (Home tele and other spawns are now all at new home)
2- Spawned stalls at home, to get some money
3- Home is now Grand Exchange

Read full topic

item.title: Elyrion - G.E | PK | PvM | Daily Updates | Friendly Community |
item.dc:creator: @Elyrion718 Elyrion718
item.description:
@Elyrion718 wrote:

[quote=“i dd s k0 i, post:8, topic:552871”]10/10 would pickup flax again

No but seriously, the server is great, owner knows his coding, doesn’t apperantly just leech source and host it. Has that remake vibe to it, yet it’s more accessable due to the several teleports added to the home npc and quest tab.[/quote]
Thank you for the comment.

11/8/2015 Updates:
1- Added an Anvil at home to make smithing more easier
2- You may now open Crafting guild door to buy your crafting skillcape
3- You may now get skillcape of smithing
4- You may now get skillcape of attack
5- You may now get skillcape of strength
6- You may now get skillcape of agility
7- Barbarian xps are now exactly like RS
8- Gnome agility xps are now exactly like RS

Read full topic

item.title: Elyrion - G.E | PK | PvM | Daily Updates | Friendly Community |
item.dc:creator: @Elyrion718 Elyrion718
item.description:
@Elyrion718 wrote:

Welliton_inc:

I’m just curious, do people play 718s?

yes,

10/8/2015 Updates:
1- Made home tele more approx of the home
2- Changed New players location, now more approx of the home
3- Doors now rest open 300 seconds (Like runescape)
4- Barrows chest for gloves spawned (Opening bank, buy foods, buy culinaromancer’s gloves)
5- Trapdoor now working to go to the barrow gloves chest
6- Fixed xp when completing advanced gnome agility
7- Home tele now teleport in the home
8- Made some security for the server

Read full topic

item.title: Elyrion - G.E | PK | PvM | Daily Updates | Friendly Community |
item.dc:creator: @Elyrion718 Elyrion718
item.description:
@Elyrion718 wrote:

9/8/2015 Updates:
1- Fixed some spawns on Al-Kharid (Thanks to slyjacob to have found)
2- Added Fishing teleports (6 new options)
3- New teleports in dungeons (Ancient caverns, brimhaven dungeon)
4- Mithril dragon have now combat anims (attack, def, death + Delete an useless drop)
5- Added new teleport in training (Wilderness grotto)
6- Added website on utility (quest tab)

Read full topic

item.title: Elyrion - G.E | PK | PvM | Daily Updates | Friendly Community |
item.dc:creator: @kaxman kaxman
item.description:
@kaxman wrote:

:mad: :eek: :|use to be a really great server, with a great owner…but for some reason the numbers didn’t come fast enough and it seems to be in a state of trying to find itself. Really think owner has what it takes, but for any community to form, u need to stick to something…anyway wish him luck, and maybe the 50 plus xp he’s throwing around today will help him to get his goal…after all it’s his server, just a bit bummed at the server it was in the start, and how much it has changed. Should appeal to a larger crowd now… good luck

Read full topic
